html:
Amazon.com Inc., a online retailer of books, apparel, electronics products, and home improvement products, has invested in Dibbs, a application that allows users to trade fractional interests in sports cards in real time. Both the companies are based in the U.S.

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Dibbs
Acquirer (Company)Amazon.com, Inc.
